© 2017 nina nicholson for spoonsandhooks com about this pattern one of the great things about the granny square cocoon cardigan is that it can be made in just three simple steps by anyone who has mastered basic crochet skills chain stitch slip_stitch single_crochet and double_crochet another great thing about this pattern is that it s so forgiving that gauge doesn t matter to get the correct size all you need to do is make your granny square at least half as tall as the intended wearer of the cardigan plus an extra inch or two that s step one step two is to fold the granny square in half and stitch up the side seams leaving openings for armholes step three is to add a border of six row of single_crochet around the armholes and the front opening that s all there is to it pattern granny square cocoon cardigan materials you ll need 1000-1250 yards of a medium weight #4 yarn of your choice crochet hook in the size recommended for your yarn scissors measuring tape yarn needle stitches used chain stitch chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet helpful crochet techniques to connect new skeins of yarn i recommend using the russian join which reduces the number of weave-ins required watch my quick tutorial video https //youtu be/kpymond0ei8 to get a clean finish on your borders with no unsightly knots i recommend the invisible finish watch my quick tutorial video https //youtu be/8pmpiw4v_t4 step 1 crochet a big granny square the granny square should be at least half as tall as the intended wearer of the cardigan plus an extra inch or two chain 6 and join in a ring with slip_stitch round 1 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet here and throughout 2 double_crochet in ring chain 2 3 double_crochet in ring chain 2 3 times slip_stitch in top of starting chain 3 page 2 of 6 crochet pattern granny square cocoon cardigan © 2017 nina nicholson for spoonsandhooks com tip lay yarn end along ring and crochet round 1 over it for an effortless weave-in round 2 chain 3 and turn 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in chain 2 space to form a corner chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in
